name: StationaryLiquidOxygenTherapyDevice
title: Stationary Liquid Oxygen Therapy Device
purpose: (Clinical Focus: Liquid oxygen therapy devices for use in the home that are designed to remain in one place while operating.),(Data Element Scope: Stationary liquid oxygen therapy devices accepted by the US Centers for Medicare and Medicaid as valid for home use.),(Inclusion Criteria: Liquid oxygen therapy devices for use in the home that are designed to remain in one place while operating.),(Exclusion Criteria: Liquid oxygen therapy devices designed to allow a change in location while operating.)
